description: This file contains utility functions for processing tool calls, extracting information from XML strings, and managing function calls within a larger software project. It references specific classes and functions related to tool execution and function invocation.

methods.name: get_function_call_for_tool_call
methods.description: Constructs a FunctionCall object from a tool call dictionary if the type is 'function'.

methods.name: extract_tool_call_from_string
methods.description: Extracts the content between specified start and end tags from a string, defaulting to '<tool_call>' and '</tool_call>'.

methods.name: remove_tool_calls_from_string
methods.description: Removes all occurrences of tool call segments enclosed by specified tags from a string.

methods.name: extract_tool_from_xml
methods.description: Parses an XML string to extract the tool name and parameters into a dictionary.

methods.name: remove_function_calls_from_string
methods.description: Removes all function call segments enclosed by specified tags from a string.

methods.name: get_function_call_for_tool_execution
methods.description: Creates a FunctionCall object from a ToolExecution instance, serializing its arguments.
